name: 떠오른 전설
description: 오래전, 신화 속 신들은 떠오른 자의 파편 네 개에 자신의 힘을 봉인했습니다. 바로 혼돈, 조화, 인내, 활기입니다. 각 파편은 그 힘을 좇는 전사에게 목숨이 걸린 시험을 내리며 역사에 불멸로 남을 기회를 약속했습니다. 지금까지도 대륙 전역의 전사들은 신조차 우러러볼 유산을 남기고자 시험에 도전합니다.

wikiSkinData.distribution: Hall of Legends Premium Pass reward (Level 10).
wikiSkinData.lore: Remember your duty as my Keeper of Patience, LeBlanc. You embody all that is strategic, methodical, and clever, as you deceive those who think themselves worthy of my power. Our power. Above all else, guide my chosen through their trials and influence the masses in the name of the Unkillable Demon King.

wikiSkinData.distribution: Purchase the Risen Legend Collection during the Hall of Legends event.
wikiSkinData.lore: You've done well, Ahri, to complete my trials with such grace and humility. To become a Risen Legend is no easy feat, and even in the face of failure, you have proven your resilience. Go forth and leave a legacy worthy of the Unkillable Demon King. When you're ready to learn your true potential… heed my call.
